product_name: First Aid BeautyTravel Size Pure Skin Face Cleanser
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackFirst Aid Beauty’s Pure Skin Face Cleanser is gentle, fragrance-free, and safe for sensitive skin – removes makeup and dirt, leaving skin soft and clean.
details: DetailsBenefitsGentle, non-stripping daily face washSafe for sensitive skinpH balanced to help maintain skin's natural acidityWon't leave skin feeling tight or dryCreamy, sumptuous textureFragrance-freeRemoves makeup + dirtKey IngredientsAloe: Helps calm, soothe, and nourish skinAllantoin: Soothing agent that calms skinGlycerin: Helps hydrate + smooth skin's appearanceFormulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesSulfates (SLS & SLES)FormaldehydeSynthetic FragranceTriclosanItem 2559168How To UseDampen face and dispense a dime-sized amount of cleanser onto fingertips. Gently massage onto all areas of the face. Remove with water or a soft, damp washcloth. Use twice daily, morning and night.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Glycerin, Stearic Acid, Hydrogenated Coconut Acid, Sodium Isethionate, Stearyl Alcohol, Allantoin,  Chrysanthemum Parthenium (Feverfew) Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Tocopherol, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides Citrate, Phenoxyethanol, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Sodium PCA, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose, Coco-Glucoside, Glyceryl Oleate, Sodium Chloride, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Maltodextrin,  Tetrasodium EDTAShipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Dampen face and dispense a dime-sized amount of cleanser onto fingertips. Gently massage onto all areas of the face. Remove with water or a soft, damp washcloth. Use twice daily, morning and night.

reviews.headline: Does NOT compare to the Red Clay Deep Cleanser
reviews.comments: I purchased this item thinking it would compare to the discontinued red clay deep cleanser and was sadly disappointed. The red cleanser improved my skin so much, this has done nothing. Will not make this the new cleanser in my routine.

reviews.headline: Excellent
reviews.comments: Received this in an Ulta gift set and am now hooked.  Goes on very smooth and creates good lather.  Most importantly, it cleans my face very well.

reviews.headline: All-time favorite cleanser
reviews.comments: This is my all-time favorite cleanser.  It definitely gets my face cleaner than other brands, such as Cerave. It leaves my skin feeling clean and soft. It's a little pricey, but worth every penny because a little goes a long way. I will re-purchase every time.

reviews.headline: Does not remove makeup
reviews.comments: I used a makeup removing balm prior to using this face cleanser and I STILL had makeup on my face. This hardly cleaned the balm residue off my face either. I guess it's TOO gentle for me

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: Such a great product, will always repurchase. Great for sensitive and dehydrated skin.

reviews.headline: Best for sensitive Skin
reviews.comments: I use this twice a day. Does not dry my skin or irritate it.

reviews.headline: Best Face Cleaner
reviews.comments: I have acne prone skin even as an adult, but this cleaner is great. My face feels clean and no breakouts.

reviews.headline: My favorite
reviews.comments: Easily removes makeup and doesn't leave a residue on your skin.

reviews.headline: Excellent Cleanser for Many Skin Types
reviews.comments: This is an all around great facial cleanser, especially if you like foam. Bother my son and I use it - I have dry skin and he has oily acne prone skin. It works well for both of our sensitive skin types. I love that it's fragrance free. Highly recommend!

reviews.headline: My fav!
reviews.comments: I have been a die hard First Aid Beauty lover for years, and this is one of my favorite products from them! It's super gentle on my sensitive skin, and perfect for traveling. I've repurchased this SO many times.

reviews.headline: Ouch
reviews.comments: Gave my skin a really bad rash around the mouth

reviews.headline: Bought because I had been given a trial size.
reviews.comments: Last year, Ulta gave me a trial size of this cleanser as a birthday gift and I just loved it so I bought a larger tube with a discount I had gotten this year.

reviews.headline: Gentle for sensitive skin!
reviews.comments: I love this cleanser so much!! I bought it on sale so it was reduced price, but i think i would be willing to pay full price. Cleansers tend to make my face feel tight after using them, but this one hydrates so well. I use micellar water to take off makeup/sunscreen and use this to cleanse afterwards. I think the combo does well for my sensitive, acne-prone skin. would def recommend!

reviews.headline: Loving it!
reviews.comments: I have sensitive skin and rosacea… let me tell you my redness has reduced and my skin is very soft plus when drying my face still hydrated.

reviews.headline: Not so sensitive
reviews.comments: I used this for a few weeks before forming an opinion. This stuff dries my skin out SO bad. very tight & dry after every use. So that's unfortunate.

reviews.headline: Not so sensitive
reviews.comments: I used this for a few weeks before forming an opinion. This stuff dries my skin out SO bad. very tight & dry after every use. So that's unfortunate.

reviews.headline: Very Reactive with Rhofade
reviews.comments: I have rosacea managed 10+ yrs with Eucerin Redness Relief gel face wash + Rhofade + Eucerin RR night. Eucerin recently discont'd those products. I tried this and my face felt sticky after the wash. After Rhofade, my face was bright red & firy

reviews.headline: Burning Eyes
reviews.comments: Was excited to use the product but it burned my eyes on the first use. It left my eyes burning for two days. Eyes were red and watery on the first use. I wouldn't  reccommend this to anyone.

reviews.headline: Solid cleanser
reviews.comments: This cleanser is a nice, gentle facewash and great for when I need a break from my harsher cleansers.

reviews.headline: Made my skin very sensitive
reviews.comments: I received this as a free gift with a purchase and I didnt think I had sensitive skin until I used this. It made my skin burn so much. Oh well :/ hopefully it works for everyone else but not for me. I like sticking the ones that I know I won't react to.

media.caption: The reaction on my neck

faceoff_positive.comments: I used this cleanser in the past, but wanted to see what else was out there. I tried a few different things, lived my life, thought I had moved on. But just like a bad boyfriend, I came back. Seriously, this gets my face clean without stripping my already dry skin of the little moisture it retains post-cleanse. I have more than two seconds between patting my face dry with a towel before it starts to feel stretched and parched before I can even reach for my moisturizer. I'm never going to leave my face cleanser ever again. I plan on proposing next month.
faceoff_positive.headline: If you love something, let it go

faceoff_negative.comments: I have been using this cleanser successfully for 3 years, cannot live without it...my holy grail. I bought a new bottle, it now says Pure Skin on it but the ingredients are the same. I noticed the consistency is a little more whipped. I used it and the next day my face felt like it had a chemical burn. I returned it the next day and bought a different bottle thinking I ended up with a defective bottle. I washed with it and ended up with same deep irritated burning. I had a quarter left in one of my older bottles and experienced no irritation at all. It looks like the product is now a lot more potent. I can tell because it really removes the dead skin...so perhaps theres more allantoin in it? It also produces more foam than before. This was the only cleanser I could use and it made my skin so amazing. I am so disappointed as it seems as though I cannot use it anymore. I am getting tired of companies always changing and strenghtening their products when there is nothing to be fixed.
faceoff_negative.headline: It has changed

rollup.name: Travel Size Pure Skin Face Cleanser
